basic.color: Flower color purple red , red, pink, magenta, yellow, white, blue purple

maintenance.soil: Slightly acidic soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, grows in sunny places, avoid summer direct strong light
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly after soil surface dries, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead, rotten, diseased leaves timely
